item.title: Python Skeletons
item.description: An example of easy project templating without the cp -r, sed, grep. I write a lot of Python. Sometimes I even get paid for it. Most of the time, itâ€™s quick libraries and utilities focused on solving small and specific problems for myself and my general team.
